definition: (arch.) minister/official/noun prefix denoting function or status/a youth

sentences.english: To make matters worse, Lang Lang's tutor had said he would not teach him any longer.
sentences.chinese: 更糟糕的是，郎朗的老师不愿意再教郎朗了。

sentences.english: To make matters worse, Lang Lang's tutor had said he would not teach him any longer.
sentences.chinese: 更糟糕的是，郎朗的老师不愿意再教郎朗了。

sentences.english: Recently, Lang Lang returned to Curtis Institute of Music to hold a master class.
sentences.chinese: 近日，郎朗应邀回费城母校Curtis举办大师课。

sentences.english: Concert pianist Lang Lang wishes he could spend more time practising video games
sentences.chinese: 音乐会钢琴家郎朗希望有更多的时间玩儿视频游戏。

sentences.english: The only thing that made the tough father angry was when Lang Lang slackened off.
sentences.chinese: 唯一让父亲不高兴的时候就是郎朗练琴松懈的时候。

sentences.english: She claimed to be as good a pianist as Langlang.
sentences.chinese: 她声称自己是像郎朗一样伟大的钢琴家。

sentences.english: Langlang played the piano for Song Zuying on the concert in Beijing Nest Palaestra.
sentences.chinese: 在北京鸟巢音乐会上，郎朗为宋祖英伴奏钢琴。

pinyin: Zhong1 yang1 Yin1 yue4 Xue2 yuan4

definition: to perform on a musical instrument
Coco Lee (1975-), pop singer, songwriter and actress
Yang Lan (1968-), Chinese media proprietor, journalist, and talk show hostess
Song Zuying (1966-), Chinese folk music singer
Wakin Chau (1960-), HK-born Taiwanese singer and actor
